co.cask.cdap.api

Interface ServiceDiscoverer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlowletContext, HttpServiceContext, MapReduceContext, ProcedureContext, ServiceWorkerContext, WorkerContext

    public interface ServiceDiscoverer
    An interface for Discovery Service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL getServiceURL(String serviceId)
      Discover the base URL for a Service in the same application, relative to which Service endpoints can be accessed
      URL getServiceURL(String applicationId, String serviceId)
      Discover the base URL for a Service, relative to which Service endpoints can be accessed

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceURL

        URL getServiceURL(String applicationId,
                String serviceId)
        Discover the base URL for a Service, relative to which Service endpoints can be accessed
        Parameters:
        applicationId - Application name
        serviceId - Service name
        Returns:
        URL for the discovered service or null if the service is not found

      • getServiceURL

        URL getServiceURL(String serviceId)
        Discover the base URL for a Service in the same application, relative to which Service endpoints can be accessed
        Parameters:
        serviceId - Service Name
        Returns:
        URL for the discovered service or null if the service is not found
